title: #406 VPR: Stop! Or My Boss Will Photo Shoot!
description:
It's getting down to the wire for Katie and Tom, and it looks like some encouragement from Lisa Vanderpump will save the day! Or maybe a photo shoot will? One thing's for certain: Brittany sure loves milk!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
